full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,KHAL KHA SA STENG YONGS KYI BDAG PO SKYABS GNAS MTHAR THUG BADZRA DHA RA RGYAL PO RJE BTZUN DAM PA RIN PO CHE RGYAL PO'I KHRI LA BZHUGS PA'I ZHABS BRTAN SMON TSIG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(CES KHAL KHA SA STENG YONGS KYI BDAG PO SKYABS GNAS KUN 'DUS KYI MTHAR THUG BADZRA DHA RA RGYAL PO RJE BTZUN DAM PA RIN PO RGYAL PO'I KHRI LA BZHUGS PA'I @003B ZHABS BRTAN SMON TSIG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI ^CHOS RJE NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG DON GRUB KYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI RANG GI SLOB BU DGE SLONG BLO BZANG NYI MA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,)
